description: Stops a running model. The operation might take a while to complete. To check the current status, call  DescribeProjectVersions. Only applies to Custom Labels projects. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:StopProjectVersion action.

parameters.name: ProjectVersionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model version that you want to stop. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:StopProjectVersion action.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the stop operation.
